item.title: Check Out (My Blog on) R-bloggers!
item.description:
Check out R-bloggers, an aggregate of R blogs on the internet that now includes my blog!

RSS readers are a wonderful and boring technology that I am beginning to use personally. R-bloggers only captures posts in the R category (confusingly, not the R tag that appears at the bottom of each post). To get all of my posts, use this RSS link.
